abstract: What’s the difference between file-based backup and image-based backup software?
snippet: What’s the difference between file-based backup and image-based backup software?
lead_paragraph: Q. I’m getting a new computer for my family and want software to back up whatever we put on it. What’s the difference between file-based backup and image-based backup software?

headline.main: Backing Up Is Not So Hard

abstract: Microsoft’s upgrade to Windows Live will blend e-mail and social networking to put it ahead of rivals.
snippet: Microsoft’s upgrade to Windows Live will blend e-mail and social networking to put it ahead of rivals.
lead_paragraph: Exactly one year ago, I wrote about the race between Yahoo and Google to turn their e-mail and instant message systems into something closer to social networks. Both companies figured it was futile to take on Facebook and MySpace directly. So they rushed to develop new ways for their users to trade news, photos and so on with the people already in their address books and buddy lists.

headline.main: Microsoft Beats Yahoo and Google to Social Inbox 2.0
